short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds alternating colors and hover effects to rows in Salesforce tabular and summary reports.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds alternating colors and hover effects to tabular and summary reports in Salesforce, making them easier to read. No setup required; just install it and you're good to go!
